snippet: Alabama's A J McCarron led a "Heisman moment" drive, beating L.S.U. in the waning seconds to preserve the Tide's perfect season, while in Oregon's toughest test yet, Kenjon Barner had his best game.
abstract: Alabama's A J McCarron led a "Heisman moment" drive, beating L.S.U. in the waning seconds to preserve the Tide's perfect season, while in Oregon's toughest test yet, Kenjon Barner had his best game.
